Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-1744 affecting package ceph for versions less than 18.2.2-6
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-1744 affecting package ceph for versions less than 18.2.2-6. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package ceph is earlier than 18.2.2-6, affected by CVE-2025-1744
